name: Do nut fear death
description:
For Mini Jam 56, which had the themes "Doughnut" and "War Zone" I made a quick arcade game where the main gimmick is that you can't aim your weapon directly. Instead you have to roll your entire character to aim. Inconvenient but fun!

The game only has a local highscore list for now, so be sure to post your scores in the comments, and let me know what you think!

This is my first game jam in a while, but I managed to whip this game out in around 8 hours. I've made all the art myself, except for the explosions. Sound effects were made with SFXR and the music was made by James Hammond. Be sure to check him out!
